jobs.title: Delivery Manager
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Lazer is a world-class digital product studio composed of 180+ senior engineers and designers with backgrounds from companies like Apple, Google, Coinbase, and more. With our product experience, we have designed, engineered, and grown products from $0 to $200M in revenue.

Clients seek out our help because we have the talent to deeply understand their needs and provide industry, technical, or product insights that are uniquely valuable to their efforts. Our clients range from early-stage startups and venture studios to recognizable retail brands and exciting enterprises. Some of our notable clients include Google, Shopify, Coinbase, Alchemy, Hinge, OVO, Polymarket, and more.

We are a remote-first organization headquartered in Toronto, Ontario, with employees worldwide. We believe in providing the best experience possible for all Lazerites by fostering a strong community through regular events, company vacations, competitive compensation, unlimited PTO, and more!

Join Lazer and help us solve problems and build the next generation of products!

Job Summary:

Lazer is seeking an experienced Delivery Manager to lead the development of enterprise eCommerce platforms on Shopify. In this role, you will own the client relationship, manage budgets, and oversee the entire project lifecycle from strategy to execution. Acting as the primary liaison between enterprise clients and Lazer’s internal teams, you’ll ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and to the highest standards.

You will drive the strategic direction of projects, manage competing priorities, and foster collaboration across cross-functional teams. Your expertise in eCommerce, particularly Shopify, coupled with your project and product management skills, will empower you to lead complex platform migrations and deliver innovative solutions for enterprise clients.

The Role

  • Client Relationship Management:

    • Serve as the primary point of contact for enterprise clients, owning the client relationship and ensuring satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.

    • Build strong relationships with senior stakeholders and C-suite executives to align project deliverables with business objectives.

    • Act as the client's trusted advisor, providing insights and recommendations to drive business growth and innovation.

  • Project Management:

    • Oversee end-to-end project delivery for Shopify-based eCommerce platforms, including migrations and custom implementations.

    • Create and manage comprehensive project plans, including timelines, budgets, resource allocation, and milestones.

    • Ensure project objectives align with client business drivers and are delivered on time and within budget.

    • Monitor and manage dependencies, risks, and issues, providing regular updates to stakeholders.

  • Product Ownership:

    • Define and prioritize product roadmaps, requirements, and user stories in collaboration with clients and internal teams.

    • Work closely with developers, designers, and QA engineers to ensure the successful implementation of features and functionalities.

    • Triage and manage defects, ensuring high-quality deliverables and securing QA sign-off.

  • Collaboration and Governance:

    • Facilitate communication and collaboration across cross-functional teams, third-party vendors, and clients.

    • Provide regular governance updates, including status reports, budget tracking, and resource utilization.

    • Supervise third-party solutions to ensure successful integration and alignment with project goals.

Requirements:

  • Professional Experience:

    • Proven experience as a Delivery Manager, Product Owner, Digital Project Manager, or similar role, with a focus on eCommerce and retail.

    • Extensive knowledge of Shopify Plus and its ecosystem, including platform migrations, custom development, and integrations.

    • Experience managing multi-million-dollar budgets and complex project portfolios.

  • Client Engagement Skills:

    • Demonstrated ability to build strong relationships with senior stakeholders and C-suite executives.

    • Exceptional communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate technical concepts to non-technical audiences.

  • Project Management Expertise:

    • Strong understanding of Agile methodologies, including experience with Scrum or Kanban frameworks.

    • Proven track record of delivering large-scale eCommerce solutions on time and within budget.

    • Expertise in creating and managing project plans, tracking dependencies, and mitigating risks.

  • Leadership and Collaboration:

    • Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and align cross-functional teams.

    • Demonstrable ability to resolve disputes, overcome challenges, and maintain a positive attitude in high-pressure situations.

  • Preferred Qualifications:

    • Experience in managing platform migrations from systems like Magento, Salesforce, or BigCommerce to Shopify.

    • Familiarity with ERP, OMS, and CMS integrations (e.g., Netsuite, Sanity, or Manhattan).

    • Shopify certifications or equivalent experience.

Why Work With Us

  • 🚀 Accelerate Your Growth: Work across multiple industries and cutting-edge projects with a team that ships fast.

  • 💥 Maximum Impact: Shape the future of the tech industry by helping ambitious projects reach their potential.

  • 🏅 True Ownership: Everyone ships code and has real autonomy with minimal meetings.

  • 💡 Continuous Learning: Be part of a team of senior engineers and designers who love learning and knowledge sharing.

Why This Might Not Be For You

  • 🤖 You Resist Modern Tools: We leverage AI and cutting-edge technology to build rapidly and focus our energy on solving the most complex, high-impact challenges for our clients.

  • 🏗️ You Crave High Structure: We thrive in an autonomous, fast-moving environment, which means you need to be comfortable with some ambiguity.

  • 😴 You Prefer Conventional Careers: Our consulting approach involves varied projects and direct client interaction — it's not for everyone.

  • 1️⃣ You Like Staying in One Lane: Our projects require adapting to different tech stacks and modern tooling quickly.

Benefits & Perks

  • 🌐 Work From Anywhere: Choose your workspace — all you need is strong wifi and a passion for building!

  • 🧘‍♂️ Work / Life Balance: We believe in our team’s ability to have it all; a great career, and time to unplug and live…you know...life.

  • 🩺 Employee Care: We provide full benefits (healthcare, dental, vision) for our employees (401k for our US employees)

  • 🏖️ Unlimited PTO: Everyone needs a break. Take at least 15 days off a year, and more if you need—just be cool about it and keep the team in mind.

  • 🎉 Regular Team Retreat: Join us for a week of team bonding at amazing destinations. Recent trips include the Dominican Republic, Cancun, and Hawaii — plus ones welcome.

  • Experience with Shopify Admin API and Storefront API

  • Familiarity with modern frameworks (Next.js, Remix)

  • Experience with video production and editing (screen recording, voiceover, post-production)

  • Ability to structure learning paths and curriculum design

  • Portfolio of published technical content (courses, blog posts, documentation, YouTube videos, etc.)

  • Active technical blog or YouTube channel

  • Experience with learning management systems

  • Previous experience as a technical trainer or educator

  • Community presence in Shopify developer circles

  • Experience with Shopify Plus features and enterprise implementations

  • Oversee Headless frontend development (e.g. React, Hydrogen, Next.js, Remix)

  • Oversee backend development (e.g. Node JS, Python, Go or Ruby preferred)

  • Lead OMS/WMS/IMS integrations (e.g. Manhattan)

  • Shopify app store development (i.e. building and launching apps privately for merchants or publicly on the Shopify App Store)

  • Ensure flawless integration of third-party apps, APIs, and customizations.

  5. Leadership: Guide the team in best practices, set clear goals and priorities, foster collaboration.

  6. Team Orientation: Awareness of team dynamics and ability to collaborate closely across departments to implement high-impact features.

  7. Adaptability: Willingness to take on various roles and responsibilities as needed in a fast-paced startup environment.

  8. Judgment: Ability to assess situations and determine when to act independently versus when to seek guidance or collaborate.

  9. Continuous Learning: Eagerness to learn from mistakes and improve decision-making skills over time in yourself and for the project team.
